title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: There is a strange behavior when attempting to copy a package in Eclipse JDT. After performing the following steps: 1. Create a new project and name it 'xxx'. 2. Open the Package Explorer view. 3. Select a package within the project (e.g., by clicking on it). 4. Right-click on the selected package and choose 'Copy' from the context menu. The observed behavior is unclear. Please provide more details on what happens or doesn't happen after performing these steps.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new project and name it 'xxx'. 2. Open the Package Explorer view. 3. Select a package within the project (e.g., by clicking on it). 4. Right-click on the selected package and choose 'Copy' from the context menu.
